meanings.sentence: I would like to book a table for two at the restaurant.
meanings.trSentence: Restoranda iki kişilik bir masa ayırtmak istiyorum.
meanings.definition: To arrange or reserve something in advance.

meanings.sentence: She read an interesting book about history last week.
meanings.trSentence: Geçen hafta ilginç bir tarih kitabı okudu.
meanings.definition: A set of printed pages fastened together inside a cover as a publication.

wordFamilies.sentence: The hotel confirmed my booking by email.
wordFamilies.definition: An arrangement to reserve something in advance.

wordFamilies.sentence: The restaurant is fully booked this evening.
They gave us a small booklet with instructions.
wordFamilies.trSentence: Bize talimatların olduğu küçük bir kitapçık verdiler.
wordFamilies.definition: A small book with a few pages, usually with information.

wordFamilies.sentence: He was always a bookish child, preferring reading to playing outside.
wordFamilies.trSentence: O her zaman kitap kurdu bir çocuktu, dışarıda oynamak yerine okumayı tercih ederdi.
wordFamilies.definition: Spending a lot of time reading or studying.
